item.title: Three Years and Counting!
item.description: Making a quick pit stop to mark this milestone in my professional career: today is my 3-year anniversary at Red Hat! Time has certainly flown by and I really cannot believe that it has been three years since I joined this company. I know it is sort of cliche to say "I can not believe that it has been this long..." and so on and so forth, but it is so true.

item.title: Extending the default EC2 root partition for an instance
item.description: Today I was playing with EC2, trying to launch a RHEL 6.3 instance so that I could then install the latest version of Katello and beat a bit on it… just for fun, you know? item.title: Life Update: July 15th, 2012
item.description: It’s been a while since I actually blogged or wrote much that wasn’t work related… so here’s a list, in no particular order, of what I have been doing these days for those who were wondering what had happened to me: I have been asked to step into a new role at work, and for the last 2-3 months I have been acting as the team lead (no job title change yet).
